= Auto Text Box Growth or Expansion =
 Goal is to auto expand textbox and textarea input boxes. Grow the textbox on keyup.
 
 * [http://demogwttextexpand.appspot.com/ Demo] - Textbox auto expander demo
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/DemoTextBoxExpand/src/org/gonevertical/textboxexpand/client/TextBoxExpandWidget.java Source] - Textbox
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/DemoTextBoxExpand/src/org/gonevertical/textboxexpand/client/TextAreaExpandWidget.java Source] - Textarea


== Cloning and Calculating ==
 The challenge is to clone the css from the textbox to a html span and figure out the size and then set it back to the textbox. A textbox is easy to change the size, but the TextArea I have found there are more variables to deal with.
